price: Nítorí náà, A pa ìjọ tó ṣàbòsí run pátápátá. Gbogbo ẹyìn ń jẹ́ ti Allāhu nìkan ṣoso, Olúwa gbogbo ẹ̀dá.¹
arabic: فَقُطِعَ دَابِرُ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْۚ وَٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: faquṭiʿa dābiru al-qawmi alladhīna ẓalamū wal-ḥamdu lillahi rabbi al-ʿālamīna
